translation.text: Route 111 detour

Route 111 detoured beginning at the start of service on Saturday, May 26, and continuing until further notice due to construction on Washington Avenue between Bellingham Square and Carey Avenue.

Outbound: Connect at Hawthorne St @ Broadway or Washington Ave @ Cary Ave.
Inbound: Connect at Washington Ave @ Bloomingdale St or Washington Ave @ Broadway.

Bypassed stops:
City Hall @ Broadway (outbound)
Washington Ave @ Crescent Ave (outbound)
125 Washington Ave opp Orange St (outbound)
Washington Ave @ Heard St (inbound)
Washington Ave @ Chestnut St (inbound)
Change at Downtown Crossing

Downtown Crossing: The Franklin St entrance will remain closed until Summer 2016 to accommodate ongoing construction for the Millennium Tower Project.

Customers desiring to enter and exit at Downtown Crossing should instead utilize entrances and exits on Summer, Chauncy, and Arch Streets. 

Customers desiring elevator access should note that Elevator 891 will be closed during this construction. If exiting, travel down the concourse to use the elevator through the glass doors and to the left of the CharlieCard Store. This elevator will take you to the lobby of 101 Arch Street. If boarding, travel to 101 Arch Street. Take the elevator in the back left corner of the lobby to the concourse. Take a right to find the Oak Grove-bound platform ahead. Customers can also enter and exit the station using the Roche Bros. elevator on Summer St. (during store hours only).

Affected routes:
Orange Line
Red Line (Ashmont branch)
Red Line (Braintree branch)
elevator unavailable

Elevator 891 DOWNTOWN CROSSING - Oak Grove-bound platform to Franklin and Washington Streets is unavailable Monday, August 10, until Summer 2016 to accommodate ongoing construction for the Millennium Tower Project.

If exiting, travel down the concourse to use the elevator through the glass doors and to the left of the CharlieCard Store. This elevator will take you to the lobby of 101 Arch Street. If boarding, travel to 101 Arch Street. Take the elevator in the back left corner of the lobby to the concourse. Take a right to find the Oak Grove-bound platform ahead.

Customers can also enter and exit the station using the Roche Bros. elevator on Summer St. (during store hours only).
elevator unavailable

Elevator 939 COURTHOUSE - Lobby to the south headhouse on Seaport Blvd is unavailable beginning Monday, October 5, until Fall 2016 due to the Yotel Hotel Development.

Please use Courthouse Elevator 940 to exit/enter Courthouse. This elevator is located on the opposite side of the lobby. At the street, cross Seaport Boulevard to use Courthouse Elevator 940.
Silver Line - SL1 and Silver Line - SL2 notice

Beginning at the start of service on Monday, October 5, Courthouse Station's south entrance/exit will be closed until Fall 2016 due to the Yotel Hotel Development.

Due to the construction of the Yotel Hotel Development, the south entrance/exit at Courthouse Station will be closed from Monday, October 5, 2015, until Fall 2016. To exit/enter the station, please use the north entrance across the street. 

Also please note that Courthouse Elevator 939 will be unavailable during this time. Customers desiring elevator access should use Courthouse Elevator 940 to exit/enter Courthouse. This elevator is located on the opposite side of the lobby. At the street, cross Seaport Boulevard to use Courthouse Elevator 940.
B St @ W 6th St closed

The following stops are closed temporarily beginning Thursday, November 19 due to construction: B Street @ West 6th Street (outbound). Please board at B Street @ West 5th Street.

Affected routes:
11
Routes 230 and 236 notice
Bus Routes 230 and 236 will pick up at berth 7 in the outer busway at Braintree Station from 6:00 AM to 2:30 PM beginning Mon Nov 23 due to construction.
elevator unavailable

Elevator 941 NORTH STATION - Lobby to the Commuter Rail and Boston Garden will be closed beginning Saturday, January 2, 2016, until further notice due to construction of the Boston Garden Development.

If exiting, return to the fare lobby to use North Station Elevator 912 (lobby to Causeway Street) or pass through the fare gates, walk the full length of the Green Line platform to use North Station Elevator 909 (lobby to Valenti Way). If boarding, cross Causeway Street to use North Station Elevator 912 (lobby to street) or travel one-tenth of a mile down Haverhill Street to the entrance located at the intersection of Haverhill Street and Valenti Way.
Burlington Mall Rd @ NE Executive Pk moved

Burlington Mall Road @ NE Executive Park permanently moving beginning Friday, December 4 from the far side of New England Executive Park to the near side in front of Tavern in The Square.

Affected routes:
350
351
Route 64 detour

Route 64 detoured due to construction. Connections can be made at North Beacon Street @ Saunders Street or North Beacon Street @ Life Street.

Affected stops:
Arthur Street @ Guest Street - Stop & Shop (outbound)
Guest Street @ Life Street (outbound)
Life Street @ Guest Street (inbound)
Arthur Street @ Guest Street - Stop & Shop (inbound)
Bus detour

Routes 64, 70 and 70A detoured from 7:30 AM to 2:00 PM on Monday, due to construction. Connections can be made at Magazine Street @ Green Street.

Affected direction: Outbound

Affected stops:
Green Street @ Pearl Street
25 Dry Dock Ave moved

25 Dry Dock Avenue moving temporarily to the Black Falcon Corner stop (21 and 27 Dry Dock Avenue) due to construction.

Affected routes:
Silver Line - SL2
Centre St @ Roseway moved

Routes 32, 35, 38, 39, & 41: Centre Street @ Roseway moved to 462 Centre Street due to construction.

Affected routes:
32

Tremont St opp Tremont Pl moved

Routes 57, 501, and 503: Beginning Monday, February 1, Tremont Street opposite Tremont Place will temporarily move ~100 feet east of its current location (toward Oak Square) due to construction.

Affected routes:
57
501
503
Haverhill Line notice

Haverhill Line notice: The mini-high platform at Andover Station is out of service. A portable lift is available.

Affected stops:
Andover
Mattapan Trolley shuttle

Buses replacing Mattapan Trolley from Ashmont to Mattapan Stations in both directions from start to end of service on Saturday, March 19, through Sunday, March 20, due to the Neponset River Greenway Project.

Due to crews performing necessary work as part of the Neponset River Greenway Project, buses will replace Mattapan Trolley service between Ashmont and Mattapan Stations in both directions from start to end of service beginning Saturday, March 19, 2016, through Sunday, March 20, 2016.

Regular Mattapan Trolley service will resume at the start of service on Monday, March 21, 2016. All shuttle bus stops are accessible for persons with disabilities. 

Shuttling the following stops: 
Ashmont
Cedar Grove
Butler
Milton
Central Ave.
Valley Road
Capen Street
Mattapan
Red Line shuttle

Buses replacing Red Line service between Alewife and Harvard Square Stations on March 26, April 2-3, 9-10, and 23-24 from start to end of service.

Due to the Floating Slab Project, buses will replace Red Line trains between Alewife and Harvard Square Stations in both directions from start to end of service during the following weekends:

- Saturday, March 26, 2016.
- Saturday, April 2, 2016, through Sunday, April 3, 2016. 
- Saturday, April 9, 2016, through Sunday, April 10, 2016. 
- Saturday, April 23, 2016, through Sunday, April 24, 2016.

Regular Red Line train service will resume at the start of service on Mondays. All shuttle bus stops are accessible for persons with disabilities. 

Shuttling the following stops:
Alewife
Davis
Porter
Harvard
Change at Braintree

Braintree Garage construction con't thru 8/16. Main pick-up/drop-off inaccessible from Ivory Street and partially out of svc starting Monday, March 21.

Construction detour signs will guide vehicles to alternate pick-up/drop-off areas in the Braintree busway. All vehicles seeking parking in the pick-up/drop-off area must use the Route 3 rotary ramp to access parking. All vehicles are strongly encouraged to use the ramp for pick-up/drop-off purposes and to follow construction signs for guidance. 

Braintree Garage construction will occur in phases with one or multiple aspects of the garage affected depending on the phase, causing diminished parking availability. 
 
Parking Availability: 
Braintree Garage reaches capacity daily at approximately 7:30 a.m. Customers are advised to proceed to Quincy Adams or North Quincy for increased chances of locating available parking spaces Monday through Friday.
 
Pick-Up/Drop-Off Traffic Pattern:
Customers are advised to follow construction
Change at Back Bay

Due to the Simon Companys Copley Place construction, Back Bay Stations Dartmouth Street underpass will be closed Sunday, March 6, through December 2016.

Due to Copley Place construction being performed by the Simon Company, the Dartmouth Street underpass  leading to and from the west side of Dartmouth Street at Back Bay Station will be temporarily closed from beginning Sunday, March 6, through December 2016. 

Customers are encouraged to use the stations main entrance on the east side of Dartmouth Street during the underpasss closure. 

Affected routes:
Orange Line
Framingham/Worcester Line
Needham Line
Franklin Line
Providence/Stoughton Line
Corporation Way closed

Routes 97, 99, 106, 110, 112: Due to construction, Corporation Way (outbound) will be closed beginning Wednesday, March 9, until further notice. Use Wellington Station for outbound service.

Affected routes:
97
99
106
110
112

Bus and Subway notice

Friday March 18th, 2016 is the last day for late night service. The last trains will depart downtown stations at approximately 2 a.m.

There will be no late night service Saturday night, March 19th, and trains will depart downtown stations at approximately 12:30am
elevator unavailable

Elevator 993 YAWKEY is unavailable.

Please see station personnel or the conductor for assistance.
Change at Hynes Convention Center

Hynes: Due to Anime Boston 2016, Hynes's Boylston Street entrance/exit will be open to enter/exit from 9 a.m. to 9 p.m. on Friday, March 25, and Saturday, March 26, and from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. on Sunday, March 27.

Affected routes:
Green Line B branch
Green Line C branch
Green Line D branch
Red Line notice

Special St. Patrick's Day shuttle bus service will be available to and from South Station and along Summer Street and East 1st Street in South Boston from 10:30 a.m. to 6 p.m. on Sunday, March 20.

Passengers should be aware that trains will frequently bypass Broadway Station due to heavy crowds caused by the St. Patricks Day parade. Passengers are encouraged to visit the link below to make travel plans.
Extra Route 7 service

Due to the St. Patrick's Day Parade, Route 7 (which normally does not operate on Sundays) will operate between South Station and City Point beginning at 7 a.m. on Sunday, March 20.

Trips from South Station toward City Point will operate on the hour with a last trip at 6 p.m.
Trips from City Point to South Station will operate on the half hour with a last trip at 6:30 p.m.
Routes 11 and 9 detour

Due to the St. Patricks Day Parade, Routes 9 and 11 will be detoured on Sunday, March 20.

Buses will be unable to service Broadway Station beginning at approximately 9:45 a.m. due to traffic and road closures. Route 9 and 11 service will not operate during the parade.

Beginning at 9 a.m. the Route 11 will be detoured due to road race preparations. Connections can be made at East 8th St @ Dorchester St or Dorchester Ave @ East 3rd St
Route 10 detour
Due to the St. Patrick's Day Parade, the Route 10 will be detoured on Sunday, March 20, starting at 9:45 AM. Service will begin/terminate at South Bay Mall.
Route 16 detour

Due to the St. Patrick's Day Parade, the Route 16 will be detoured on Sunday, March 20, starting at 9:45 AM.

Connections can be made at South Bay Mall and the lower level of JFK/UMass Station.
Route 17 detour

Due to the St. Patrick's Day Parade, the Route 17 will be detoured on Sunday, March 20 starting at 9:45 AM.

Connections can be made at Fields Corner Station and the lower level of JFK/UMass Station.
Route 47 detour

Due to the St. Patrick's Day Parade, the Route 47  will be detoured on Sunday, March 20, starting at 9:45 AM.

Service will begin/terminate on Albany St @ East Berkeley St.
Minor Route 1 delay
Route 1 experiencing minor delays.

Silver Line - SL5 experiencing minor delays due to traffic.
Framingham/Worcester Line track change

Please board all Worcester Line trains on the outbound platforms at Ashland and Southborough today.

Affected stops:
Ashland
Southborough
Minor Route 111 delay
Route 111 experiencing minor delays due to traffic.
Airport elevator unavailable

Elevator 931 AIRPORT - Wonderland - bound platform to mezzanine unavailable due to maintenance.

To go from the Wonderland platform to the mezzanine, use Airport Elevator 956 (Athletic Fields to overpass) and take the ramp to Airport Elevator 955 (Bremen Street to overpass) to the Bowdoin platform.
South Station elevator unavailable

Elevator 919 SOUTH STATION - Alewife Bound Platform to Silver Line Platform unavailable due to maintenance.

If exiting the Red Line, use South Station Elevator 927 to the P1 Level of the Silver Line. Exit the elevator, go straight past the stairs, and turn right to South Station Elevator 901. Exit at the lobby. 
If boarding, cross the lobby and take South Station Elevator 901 down to the Silver Line platform. Take South Station Elevator 927 to the Red Line platform to Alewife.
Framingham/Worcester Line track change
Please board all Framingham/Worcester Line trains on the inbound platform at Framingham.
Porter elevator unavailable

Elevator 983 PORTER SQUARE - Red Line Platforms to Lobby unavailable due to maintenance.

Please use adjacent Porter Square Elevator 987 to reach the platforms or the lobby.
Kingston/Plymouth Line delay
Kingston/Plymouth Train 061 (8:56 am inbound) is operating 10-15 minutes behind schedule between Braintree and Plymouth due to train traffic.

CT2 experiencing minor delays due to traffic.

Route 66 experiencing minor delays due to traffic.
